name: Display a message if there is no task assigned to current user

testSteps.description: Given There are 5 tasks, 0 of them assigned to the current user
When I show the list of tasks
Then I see a message "no task is currently assigned to you"

userStory.narrative:
In order to work on own tasks
As a transport specialist
I want to see a list of all tasks assigned to me

title: Display a message if there is no task assigned to current user

tags.name: Manage list of tasks/Show list of tasks
Show list of tasks/Show list of tasks for current user
